languages.text: "Надеюсь, ни у кого не осталось сомнений в виновности династии фон Валанциус? Однако давайте же позволим Вольному Торговцу сказать последнее слово — нам всем любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, ни у кого не осталось сомнений в виновности династии фон Валанциус? Однако давайте же позволим Вольному Торговцу сказать последнее слово — нам всем любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, ни у кого не осталось сомнений в виновности династии фон Валанциус? Однако давайте же позволим Вольному Торговцу сказать последнее слово — нам всем любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

traits.locale_text: "I hope nobody is harbouring any doubts about the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader say {mf|his|her} final word — we are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this inquiry."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

languages.text: « J'ose espérer que plus personne ne doute de la culpabilité de la dynastie von Valancius ? Mais laissons {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} le mot de la fin. Nous sommes tous curieux de connaître les enseignements que vous avez tirés de cette enquête. »
languages.original_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: « J'ose espérer que plus personne ne doute de la culpabilité de la dynastie von Valancius ? Mais laissons {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} le mot de la fin. Nous sommes tous curieux de connaître les enseignements que vous avez tirés de cet interrogatoire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “希望没有人再对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的罪行存在任何怀疑。不过，我们让行商浪人最后说一句话吧。我们所有人都想知道，你从这场审判中明白了哪些事情。”
languages.original_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: “希望没有人再对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的罪行存在任何怀疑。不过，我们让行商浪人最后说一句话吧。我们所有人都想知道，你从这场审判中明白了哪些事情。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の罪について、疑いを抱く者はもはやいないだろう。だがここで自由開拓者に最後の発言を許すとしよう。我々はみな、あなたがこの審問から何を得たのか知りたがっている」
languages.original_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の罪について、疑いを抱く者はもはやいないだろう。だがここで自由開拓者に最後の発言を許すとしよう。我々はみな、あなたがこの審問から何を得たのか知りたがっている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Niemand zweifelt mehr an der Schuld der Dynastie von Valancius, hoffe ich? Aber überlassen wir doch {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} das letzte Wort. Wir sind alle extrem neugierig, was Ihr bei dieser Ermittlung herausgefunden habt."
languages.original_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, dass niemand mehr Zweifel hat bezüglich der Schuld der Dynastie von Valancius? Aber überlassen wir doch {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} das letzte Wort. Wir sind alle extrem neugierig, was Ihr bei dieser Ermittlung herausgefunden habt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Confío en que nadie albergue ninguna duda sobre la culpabilidad de la dinastía Von Valancius. Pero dejemos que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente presente su alegato final. Tenemos mucha curiosidad por saber qué opina del último testimonio».
languages.original_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: «Confío en que nadie albergue ninguna duda sobre la culpabilidad de la dinastía Von Valancius. Pero dejemos que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente presente su alegato final. Tenemos mucha curiosidad por saber qué opina del último testimonio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Umarım hiç kimsenin içinde von Valancius hanedanlığının suçlu olduğuna dair bir şüphe kalmamıştır. Yine de Hür Tacir'den son sözlerini alalım. Bu sorgulamadan çıkardığı sonuçları duymayı hepimiz merakla bekliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "I hope no one is harbouring any doubts as to the guilt of the von Valancius dynasty? But let us allow the Rogue Trader to say {mf|his|her} final word. We are all curious to know what you have gleaned from this enquiry."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım hiç kimsenin içinde von Valancius hanedanlığının suçlu olduğuna dair bir şüphe kalmamıştır? Hür Tacir'den son sözlerini alalım ama. Bu sorgulamadan çıkardığı sonuçları duymayı hepimiz merakla bekliyoruz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
